MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL57 postcode area of Bangor affecting properties in High Street and the surrounding area We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:27am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:15am on the 21st April 2021.
